alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 10:22PM CDT until May 07 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hidalgo County in Deep South Texas... South central Starr County in Deep South Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1021 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grulla Middle School, or near Sullivan City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mission, Palmview, Penitas, Sullivan City, La Joya, Palmhurst, Garciasville, Los Ebanos, Sharyland and South McAllen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
